definitions.text: vaporize and then condense right back again
change or cause to change directly from a solid into a vapor without first melting

examples: well-meaning ineptitude that rises to empyreal absurdity
the sublime beauty of the night

definitions.text: lifted up or set high; - Milton
examples: their hearts were jocund and sublime

definitions.text: of high moral or intellectual value; elevated in nature or style; ; - Oliver Franks
examples: argue in terms of high-flown ideals
